Title: Xoml
Description: XOML is an XML based object persistence framework like XAML. It is completely independent of WPF, while still providing features like Markup extensions, data-binding and more to any object. In addition, this framework is written in C# 2.0 and runs on Windows, Mono and the .NET Compact Framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
XOML is an XML based object persistence framework like XAML. It is completely independent of WPF, while still providing features like Markup extensions, data-binding and more to any object. In addition, this framework is written in C# 2.0 and runs on Windows, Mono and the .NET Compact Framework.
